description: Correlating a user session with a distinct lack of new commands in their .bash_history can be a clue to suspicious behavior. Monitor for modification of PowerShell command history settings through processes being created with -HistorySaveStyle SaveNothing command-line arguments and use of the PowerShell commands Set-PSReadlineOption -HistorySaveStyle SaveNothing and Set-PSReadLineOption -HistorySavePath {File Path}. For network devices, monitor for missing or inconsistencies in Network Device CLI logging present in AAA logs as well as in specific RADIUS and TACAS+ logs.
